body: Hi! Does anyone have an idea why I get this result when baking with the ReColorMesh component? The meshes look fine when previewing in Grasshopper, but I only get these lines when baking them (using the bakeIt option) – both the meshes and the legend look like this. It has always worked fine before, so it seems to be something specific to this simulation – but I cannot find out what... [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/pS32jW-GgixdT84HdJvHAB6yCpBuMCMB54xlJ01CB9atGDu7EhxzrCnG6WACwhlyAoMu6REwvxme1sGVqVArb5d22CWvrU4k/Skrmklipp.PNG)
